raw_desc: Voice-controlled smart display with speaker that uses the Alexa voice service to play music, recite the Holy Quran, set timers and alarms, make your home smarter with compatible devices, and more. Look in when you're away with the built-in 13 MP camera. Control compatible smart home devices using your voice or the interactive display. You can ask Alexa to turn on/off lights and smart plugs, or even adjust air conditioning temperature. Streams millions of songs, podcasts, radio, anasheed from Anghami and Spotify and play music throughout your home with multi-room music. Ask Alexa to recite the Holy Quran, set prayer time reminders and listen to athkar (supplications). Ask questions about TV listing, Tadawul Stock, currency exchange rates, name meanings and so much more! Ask Alexa to play TV programmes and films via Prime Video and Netflix, ask Fatafeet to help you cook your favorite recipe, or even watch your favorite podcasts from Spotify or Anghami. Keep your household connected with intercom functionality and announcements to other rooms or the entire household.
